### Production

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:START (DEPENDENCYTABLE) -->

| **Dependency**                                                                                              | **Description**                                                                                                             | **Version** | **License** | **Type**   |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- | ----------- | ---------- |
| [chalk@^2.1.0](https://github.com/chalk/chalk)                                                              | Terminal string styling done right                                                                                          | 2.3.0       | MIT         | production |
| [find-up@^2.1.0](https://github.com/sindresorhus/find-up)                                                   | Find a file by walking up parent directories                                                                                | 2.1.0       | MIT         | production |
| [sort-scripts@^1.0.0](https://github.com/camacho/sort-scripts#readme)                                       | Sort a map of scripts in a logical order                                                                                    | 1.0.0       | MIT         | production |
| [yargs@^11.0.0](http://yargs.js.org/)                                                                       | yargs the modern, pirate-themed, successor to optimist.                                                                     | 11.0.0      | MIT         | production |
| [codecov@^3.0.0](https://github.com/codecov/codecov-node)                                                   | Uploading report to Codecov: https://codecov.io                                                                             | 3.0.0       | MIT         | dev        |
| [eslint@^4.6.0](https://eslint.org)                                                                         | An AST-based pattern checker for JavaScript.                                                                                | 4.16.0      | MIT         | dev        |
| [eslint-config-airbnb-base@^12.0.0](https://github.com/airbnb/javascript)                                   | Airbnb's base JS ESLint config, following our styleguide                                                                    | 12.1.0      | MIT         | dev        |
| [eslint-config-prettier@^2.6.0](https://github.com/prettier/eslint-config-prettier)                         | Turns off all rules that are unnecessary or might conflict with Prettier.                                                   | 2.9.0       | MIT         | dev        |
| [eslint-plugin-import@^2.7.0](https://github.com/benmosher/eslint-plugin-import)                            | Import with sanity.                                                                                                         | 2.8.0       | MIT         | dev        |
| [execa@^0.9.0](https://github.com/sindresorhus/execa)                                                       | A better `child_process`                                                                                                    | 0.9.0       | MIT         | dev        |
| [glob@^7.1.2](https://github.com/isaacs/node-glob)                                                          | a little globber                                                                                                            | 7.1.2       | ISC         | dev        |
| [husky@^0.14.3](https://github.com/typicode/husky)                                                          | Prevents bad commit or push (git hooks, pre-commit/precommit, pre-push/prepush, post-merge/postmerge and all that stuff...) | 0.14.3      | MIT         | dev        |
| [install-deps-postmerge@^1.0.2](https://github.com/camacho/install-deps-postmerge#readme)                   | Install package.json dependencies using npm or yarn as git post merge hook                                                  | 1.0.2       | MIT         | dev        |
| [jest@^22.0.4](http://facebook.github.io/jest/)                                                             | Delightful JavaScript Testing.                                                                                              | 22.1.4      | MIT         | dev        |
| [lint-staged@^7.0.0](https://github.com/okonet/lint-staged)                                                 | Lint files staged by git                                                                                                    | 7.0.0       | MIT         | dev        |
| [markdown-magic@^0.1.17](https://github.com/DavidWells/markdown-magic#readme)                               | Automatically update markdown files with content from external sources                                                      | 0.1.20      | MIT         | dev        |
| [markdown-magic-dependency-table@^1.2.2](https://github.com/camacho/markdown-magic-dependency-table#readme) | Generate table of information about dependencies automatically in markdown                                                  | 1.3.2       | MIT         | dev        |
| [markdown-magic-engines@^1.0.1](https://github.com/camacho/markdown-magic-engines#readme)                   | Render engine requirements in Markdown files via Markdown Magic                                                             | 1.0.1       | MIT         | dev        |
| [markdown-magic-install-command@^1.3.0](https://github.com/camacho/markdown-magic-install-command#readme)   | Print install command for markdown file                                                                                     | 1.3.1       | MIT         | dev        |
| [markdown-magic-package-scripts@^1.2.0](https///github.com:camacho/markdown-magic-package-scripts)          | Print list of scripts in package.json with descriptions                                                                     | 1.2.1       | MIT         | dev        |
| [markdown-magic-prettier@^1.0.3](https://github.com/camacho/markdown-magic-prettier#readme)                 | Prettify JS blocks                                                                                                          | 1.0.4       | MIT         | dev        |
| [npm-run-all@^4.0.2](https://github.com/mysticatea/npm-run-all)                                             | A CLI tool to run multiple npm-scripts in parallel or sequential.                                                           | 4.1.2       | MIT         | dev        |
| [prettier@^1.7.0](https://prettier.io)                                                                      | Prettier is an opinionated code formatter                                                                                   | 1.10.2      | MIT         | dev        |
